^(catalog_name)$.description: Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

^(include_browse)$.description: Whether to include tables in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

^(include_delta_metadata)$.description: Whether delta metadata should be included in the response.

^(include_manifest_capabilities)$.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

^(max_results)$.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

^(omit_columns)$.description: Whether to omit the columns of the table from the response or not.

^(omit_properties)$.description: Whether to omit the properties of the table from the response or not.

^(omit_username)$.description: Whether to omit the username of the table (e.g. owner, updated_by, created_by) from the response or not.

^(page_token)$.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

^(schema_name)$.description: Name of parent schema for tables of interest.

catalogName.description: Name of parent catalog for tables of interest.

includeManifestCapabilities.description: Whether to include a manifest containing capabilities the table has.

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results per page that should be returned.

omitColumns.description: Whether to omit the columns of the table from the response or not.

omitProperties.description: Whether to omit the properties of the table from the response or not.

omitUsername.description: Whether to omit the username of the table (e.g. owner, updated_by, created_by) from the response or not.

pageToken.description: Opaque pagination token to go to next page based on previous query.

schemaName.description: Name of parent schema for tables of interest.
